00018 #include "cprofilemgr.h"
00019 
00020 //Qt includes
00021 #include <qdir.h>
00022 #include <qfile.h>
00023 #include <qlist.h>
00024 
00025 //KDE includes
00026 #include <kstandarddirs.h>
00027 
00028 CProfileMgr::CProfileMgr() : m_startupProfile(0) {
00029     m_profiles.setAutoDelete(true);
00030     
00031     KStandardDirs stdDirs;
00032     m_profilePath = stdDirs.saveLocation("data", "bibletime/profiles/");    
00033     
00034     QDir d( m_profilePath );
00035     QStringList files = d.entryList("*.xml");
00036     for ( QStringList::Iterator it = files.begin(); it != files.end(); ++it ) {
00037         if ((*it) != "_startup_.xml")
00038             m_profiles.append(new CProfile(m_profilePath + *it));
00039         else
00040             m_startupProfile = new CProfile(m_profilePath + *it);
00041     }
00042 }
00043 
00044 CProfileMgr::~CProfileMgr(){
00045     m_profiles.clear();//autoDelete is enabled, so all profiles are deleted
00046 }
00047 
00049 const QPtrList<CProfile>& CProfileMgr::profiles(){  
00050     return m_profiles;
00051 }
00052 
00054 CProfile* CProfileMgr::create( const QString name ){
00055     CProfile* p = new CProfile(QString::null, name);
00056     m_profiles.append(p);
00057     
00058     return p;   
00059 }
00060 
00062 const bool CProfileMgr::remove( CProfile* p ){
00063     bool ret = false;
00064     QFile f( p->filename() );
00065     if (f.exists())
00066         f.remove();     
00067     if(m_profiles.remove(p)); //auto delete is enabled
00068         ret = true;
00069     return ret;
00070 }
00071 
00072 const bool CProfileMgr::remove( const QString& profile) {
00073     bool ret = false;
00074     for (CProfile* p = m_profiles.first(); p; p = m_profiles.next()) {
00075         if (p->name() == profile) {
00076             remove(p);
00077             ret =  true;
00078         }
00079     }
00080     return ret;
00081 }
00082 
00084 CProfile* CProfileMgr::profile(const QString& name) {
00085     for (m_profiles.first(); m_profiles.current(); m_profiles.next()) {
00086         if (m_profiles.current()->name() == name) {
00087             return m_profiles.current();    
00088         }
00089     }
00090     return 0;
00091 }
00092 
00094 CProfile* CProfileMgr::startupProfile(){
00095     if (!m_startupProfile)
00096         m_startupProfile = new CProfile(QString::null, "_startup_");
00097     return m_startupProfile;    
00098 }
00099 
00101 void CProfileMgr::refresh(){
00102     m_profiles.clear(); //delete all profiles
00103     QDir d( m_profilePath );
00104     QStringList files = d.entryList("*.xml");
00105     for ( QStringList::Iterator it = files.begin(); it != files.end(); ++it ) {
00106         CProfile p(m_profilePath + *it);
00107         if (p.name() == "_startup_") { //new startup profile
00108             if  (!m_startupProfile) //don't put this in the if clause above,it doesn't work!
00109                 m_startupProfile = new CProfile(m_profilePath + *it);
00110         }
00111         else if (!profile(p.name())) { //don't have it already
00112             m_profiles.append(new CProfile(m_profilePath + *it));
00113         }
00114     }
00115 }
